name: todo_backend
description: Todo Application using PG SQL and Typescript

scripts.prisma:generate: npm run prisma:merge && npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run prisma:merge && npx prisma db push
scripts.development: npm run prisma:migrate && ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts
scripts.start: npm run prisma:generate && npx tsc && node dist/server.js
